column3: News;Phnom Penh:------ A fire broke out at on the third and fourth floors of a building on Street 106
column4: in Daun Penh district. Firefighters attended the scene just after 2:00 PM
column7: the fire started around 1:30 pm.------Firefighting officers said that 15 trucks wwre used to tackle the blaze.------He added that the competent authorities are still unclear what caused the incident
column8: and are still researching  at the scene.------The fire did not cause any injuries.------https://tvfb.news/article/14926
